name: Mithos: Viral
description:
Dispatched to a remote outpost on a distant world, your sole task is to survive as long as you can against an increasingly overwhelming horde of reanimated robots. These primitive androids are overcome with a logic virus plaguing the local solar system, compelling them to a single objective: remove any organic life in their path.

Mithos: Viral is a standalone minigame built with the intent to show off Mithos' moment-to-moment gameplay progress thus far in a fun, replayable way. 

If you like what you see, consider joining the Mithos Discord!

https://discord.gg/wkjQGazXTj

Disclaimer: Many features shown in this minigame may change drastically for or be removed entirely from the main release of Mithos.
